channel.title: NPR Topics: Culture
channel.description: Art and entertainment commentary plus interviews, book reviews, movie reviews, music reviews, comedy, and visual art. Subscribe to podcasts and follow trends in music, painting, art, architecture, photography, and design.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Comedian Kumail Nanjiani on the experience he wishes he could give every person
item.description: On Wild Card, well-known guests answer the kinds of questions we often think about but don't talk about. Comedian Kumail Nanjiani talks about the experience he wishes he could give every person.
item.content:encoded: On Wild Card, well-known guests answer the kinds of questions we often think about but don't talk about. Comedian Kumail Nanjiani talks about the experience he wishes he could give every person.

item.title: Rob Reiner loved America. He thought it could be better
item.description: NPR's Scott Detrow speaks with writer Todd S. Purdum about his last interview with Rob Reiner and the filmmaker's legacy as an advocate.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Scott Detrow speaks with writer Todd S. Purdum about his last interview with Rob Reiner and the filmmaker's legacy as an advocate.
item.dc:creator: Elena Burnett

item.title: President Trump to add his own name to the Kennedy Center
item.description: The arts institution will be called the Trump-Kennedy Center. The president's press secretary said it comes after a unanimous vote by the center's board, which Trump took over earlier this year.
item.content:encoded:
The arts institution will be called the Trump-Kennedy Center. The president's press secretary said it comes after a unanimous vote by the center's board, which Trump took over earlier this year.

(Image credit: Jim Watson)
item.dc:creator: Andrew Limbong

item.title: Lucy Liu on 'Rosemead,' rejection and returning to Mandarin
item.description: The child of Chinese immigrants, Liu didn't learn English until she was 5. She plays a terminally ill woman grappling with her teenage son's mental health crisis in Rosemead.
item.content:encoded:
The child of Chinese immigrants, Liu didn't learn English until she was 5. She plays a terminally ill woman grappling with her teenage son's mental health crisis in Rosemead.

(Image credit: Vivien Killilea)
item.dc:creator: Tonya Mosley

item.title: From toddlers to teens, here's your one-stop shop for young readers
item.description: If you have kids in your life who are ready to broaden their book horizons we have recommendations for you! Here you'll find tried-and-true picture books, chapter books, and YA, all published in 2025.
item.content:encoded: If you have kids in your life who are ready to broaden their book horizons we have recommendations for you! Here you'll find tried-and-true picture books, chapter books, and YA, all published in 2025.
item.dc:creator: Ivy Buck

item.title: A new 'Avatar,' a marital stand-up story and a gut-wrenching drama are in theaters
item.description: A new drama uses the real, gut-wrenching recordings of a call for help from Gaza to tell a harrowing and profound story.
item.content:encoded:
A new drama uses the real, gut-wrenching recordings of a call for help from Gaza to tell a harrowing and profound story.

(Image credit: 20th Century Studios)
item.dc:creator: Bob Mondello

item.title: Where we went: NPR's U.S. travel guide for the curious
item.description: NPR's staff traveled a lot in 2025. From a Mardi Gras workshop to a festival celebrating the mythical Mothman, here are some places and events we thought you might want to check out, too.
item.content:encoded:
NPR's staff traveled a lot in 2025. From a Mardi Gras workshop to a festival celebrating the mythical Mothman, here are some places and events we thought you might want to check out, too.

(Image credit: Images by NPR)
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: A library helps foster an unlikely friendship
item.description: A devotion to reading brings one elderly woman in Indiana to her local library. That's true for one young child, too. They've formed an unlikely friendship and visit the library together each week.
item.content:encoded: A devotion to reading brings one elderly woman in Indiana to her local library. That's true for one young child, too. They've formed an unlikely friendship and visit the library together each week.
item.dc:creator: Ella Abbott

item.title: 'Harry Potter' fans are flying to Broadway to see the original Draco Malfoy
item.description: Almost eight years after Harry Potter and the Cursed Child opened on Broadway, Tom Felton, who played Draco Malfoy in the films, is now playing him as an adult onstage.
item.content:encoded:
Almost eight years after Harry Potter and the Cursed Child opened on Broadway, Tom Felton, who played Draco Malfoy in the films, is now playing him as an adult onstage.

(Image credit: Matthew Murphy)
item.dc:creator: Jeff Lunden

item.title: The best movies and TV of 2025, picked for you by NPR critics
item.description: Whether you plan to head out to the theater or binge from the couch, our critics have gathered together their favorite films and TV shows of 2025.
item.content:encoded: Whether you plan to head out to the theater or binge from the couch, our critics have gathered together their favorite films and TV shows of 2025.
item.dc:creator: Bob Mondello
